verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month, in the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after they had come <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H5375><s%> a census <S%H7218><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male, <S%H2145><s%> head <S%H1538><s%> by head <S%H1538><s%>

from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [is able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> you and Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall number <S%H6485><s%> them by their armies. <S%H6635><s%>
"With you, moreover, there shall be a man <S%H376><s%> of each <S%H376><s%> tribe, <S%H4294><s%> each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> of his father's household. <S%H1004><s%>

"These <S%H428><s%> then are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> with you: of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur; <S%H7707><s%>
of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai; <S%H6701><s%>
of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab; <S%H5992><s%>
of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar; <S%H6686><s%>
of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon; <S%H2497><s%>

of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph: <S%H3130><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud; <S%H5989><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur; <S%H6301><s%>
of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni; <S%H1441><s%>
of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai; <S%H5996><s%>
of Asher, <S%H836><s%> Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ochran; <S%H5918><s%>
of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Deuel; <S%H1845><s%>
of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan. <S%H5881><s%>

"These <S%H428><s%> are they who <S%H7148><s%> were called <S%H7148><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> the leaders <S%H5387><s%> of their fathers' tribes; <S%H4294><s%> they were the heads <S%H7218><s%> of divisions <S%H505><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had been designated <S%H9344><s%> by name, <S%H8034><s%>

and they assembled <S%H6950><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> together on the first <S%H259><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%> Then they registered <S%H3205><s%> by ancestry <S%H3205><s%> in their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> head <S%H1538><s%> by head, <S%H1538><s%>
just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%> So he numbered <S%H6485><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>

Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Israel's first-born, their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> head <S%H1538><s%> by head, <S%H1538><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> [were] 46500.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> head <S%H1538><s%> by head, <S%H1538><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> [were] 59300.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> [were] 45650.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> [were] 74600.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> [were] 54400.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> [were] 57400.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> [namely,] of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> [were] 40500.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> [were] 32200.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> [were] 35400.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> [were] 62700.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> [were] 41500.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> their genealogical <S%H8435><s%> registration <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war, <S%H6635><s%>
their numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> [were] 53400.

These <S%H428><s%> are the ones who were numbered, <S%H6485><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered, <S%H6485><s%> with the leaders <S%H5387><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> each <S%H376><s%> of whom <S%H259><s%> was of his father's household. <S%H1004><s%>

So all <S%H3605><s%> the numbered <S%H6485><s%> men of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> [was able to] go <S%H3318><s%> out to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%>
even all <S%H3605><s%> the numbered <S%H6485><s%> men were 603550.
The Levites, <S%H3881><s%> however, were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them by their fathers' tribe. <S%H4294><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Only <S%H389><s%> the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> you shall not number, <S%H6485><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> shall you take <S%H5375><s%> their census <S%H7218><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"But you shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> its furnishings <S%H3627><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that belongs to it. They shall carry <S%H5375><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its furnishings, <S%H3627><s%> and they shall take <S%H8334><s%> care <S%H8334><s%> of it; they shall also camp <S%H2583><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

"So when the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> is to set <S%H5265><s%> out, the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall take <S%H3381><s%> it down; <S%H3381><s%> and when the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> encamps, <S%H2583><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall set <S%H6965><s%> it up. But the layman <S%H2114><s%> who comes <S%H7131><s%> near <S%H7131><s%> shall be put <S%H4191><s%> to death. <S%H4191><s%>

"And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall camp, <S%H2583><s%> each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> by his own camp, <S%H4264><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> by his own standard, <S%H1714><s%> according to their armies. <S%H6635><s%>

"But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall camp <S%H2583><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> that there may be no <S%H3808><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> on the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> So the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony. <S%H5715><s%>"

Thus the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did; <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> they did. <S%H6213><s%>
